opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Pierce County, Washington v. Guillen, Legal Guardian of Guillen, Minors

opinion:
535 U.S. 1033

PIERCE COUNTY, WASHINGTON
v.
GUILLEN, LEGAL GUARDIAN OF GUILLEN ET AL., MINORS, ET AL.

No. 01-1229.

Supreme Court of the United States.

April 29, 2002.

1

Sup. Ct. Wash. Motions of International Municipal Lawyers Association and Association of American Railroads for leave to file briefs as amici curiae granted. Certiorari granted. Reported below: 144 Wash. 2d 696, 31 P. 3d 628.
